Thanks for your submission! We will review the cheat and will inform you by email if we are going to add it to the database. By the way: You can edit or delete your submitted cheats via our website www.cheat-database.com.
There went something wrong submitting your cheat. Please try again later.

Please read our little author guidelines on how to write easy-to-understand cheats.

- Use capital letters for character or object names. Always use a capital letter after a full stop.

- Try not to make long sentences. Short sentences are easier to understand. Try not to use “then” to connect sentences either.

- Don't use the “I” form, i.e. “I did” or “it helped me” etc. Use the third person for instructions.

I hereby agree that my submitted cheat may be proofread and grammatically in order to meet our minimum quality requirement.

By submitting this cheat you will grant Cheat-Database the right to publish and use your submitted content via App and Website. The author will not gain any financial claims from Cheat-Database.

All your submitted cheats will be saved to your Cheat-Database member account. Once a cheat has been approved by us you will be notified by email.

If you want to make any changes to your cheats you can login with your login information on www.cheat-database.com via your computer. There you can add screenshots, edit the text or delete your cheats.

No personal information such as your email address will be published anywhere on Cheat-Database or to any other platforms associated or not associated with Cheat-Database. This data is only used to identify the user account within this app and on cheat-database.com.
Please accept the Terms & Conditions by clicking the check box above the submit button.

To submit you first have to search the database for the game you want to submit a cheat for. In the game view select the menu item \"Submit Cheat\" to reach the submission form.\n\nPlease note that you have to be logged in as a member in order to be able to submit cheats.

Before you continue, please read and understand the following rules regarding the content of submitted tricks.

 The following contents are not allowed:

 - Cheats/instructions that block or interfere with other apps/games when ads are displayed
 - Cheats, which influence the course of other apps/games
 - Instructions that allow hacking of services, software or hardware or the circumvention of security measures
 - Cheats that access or use services or APIs in a manner that violates the Terms of Use of the respective app/game
 - Third-party code that downloads or executes code not intended in the app/game
 - Cheats/code that enables or is associated with the distribution or installation of malicious software

 Submitted tricks that violate one or more of the above points will be deleted.
